title: feat: remove SKIP logic from social news pipeline
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Unmuting the hive
gist.blurb: We've removed the filter. Now the bot shares every single update, big or small.
gist.summary: Removed the 'SKIP' sentinel logic from the social pipeline to ensure every merged PR generates a post.
gist.impact: Fixes an issue where the bot posted literal 'SKIP' text and guarantees 100% coverage of merged code.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot removing a 'mute' button or tape from a microphone, symbolizing that nothing is held back anymore. The pipeline is now fully open.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot removing a piece of tape labeled 'SKIP' from a vintage microphone. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'ON AIR'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
